name: SULFUS HELP "THE PORTAL" Weekend Offer!!
description:
SULFUS HELP THE PORTAL.
One afternoon, Sulfus "the nervous" walks around his world quietly. A sudden and freak storm breaks while Sulfus is in the forest. A strange object sucks him up and he is thrown to weird worlds.
Help him to find the answer... It (si se refiere a la respuesta) He (si se refiere a Sulfus)is always on the verge... That is the answer to many problems... Always on the verge... of total madness
22 levels of pure adrenalin.
It is not just about running, it is about knowing where and what to do.
The answers are simpler than they seem.
And the surprises... They are on the verge of your imagination.
This game will be completed with two more instalments of 22 levels or more in each of them...
Buy it now and you will get them free...
This help our team to continue creating new challenges.
We want to know your opinion. We will consider all your suggestions.
Contact us. We are at your disposal.
